0.1.name: wordpress/blog-members-directory-shortcode
0.1.description:
The plugin gives users the oportunity to embed a directory of Members of a site within any page. When using the shortcode [blog_members] when writing in the content of any page, the user includes in the page, a list of all Members of that site.

I am working on adding the ability to set options, such as hide_admin, hide_empty, etc...
